four_cores_of_credibility.name: Integrity
four_cores_of_credibility.definition: Congruence between values, words, and actions.
operationalization: Stand for something (act from clear values).

four_cores_of_credibility.name: Intent
four_cores_of_credibility.definition: Genuine concern and motive to seek mutual benefit.

four_cores_of_credibility.name: Capabilities
four_cores_of_credibility.definition: The talents, skills, knowledge, and style used to produce results.

four_cores_of_credibility.name: Results
four_cores_of_credibility.definition: Track record of performance and getting the right things done.
operationalization: Take responsibility for outcomes, not just activity.
Build a visible track record over time.

thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.name: Talk Straight
thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.core_intent: Be honest and tell the truth.

thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.name: Demonstrate Respect
thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.core_intent: Show that you genuinely care for others.
operationalization: Respect everyone, not only powerful people.

thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.name: Create Transparency
operationalization: Err on the side of disclosure.
Operate as 'what you see is what you get'.

thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.name: Right Wrongs
thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.core_intent: Make restitution when you are wrong.

thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.name: Show Loyalty
thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.core_intent: Give credit to others and speak about them as if present.
operationalization: Do not badmouth people who are not in the room.

thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.name: Deliver Results
thirteen_behaviors_of_high_trust.core_intent: Establish a track record of getting the right things done.
operationalization: Do what you said you would do.
